metadata.title: CVE-2020-16093 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
[Unknown description]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-16093` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemonldap-ng - 2.0.9+ds-1
lemonldap-ng-fastcgi-server - 2.0.9+ds-1
lemonldap-ng-handler - 2.0.9+ds-1
lemonldap-ng-uwsgi-app - 2.0.9+ds-1
liblemonldap-ng-common-perl - 2.0.9+ds-1
liblemonldap-ng-handler-perl - 2.0.9+ds-1
liblemonldap-ng-manager-perl - 2.0.9+ds-1
liblemonldap-ng-portal-perl - 2.0.9+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lemonldap-ng package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.9+ds-1').
